doc:
Robert Francis (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Francis_(actor) 0 Robert Charles Francis (February 26, 1930 – July 31, 1955) was an American actor. He appeared in only four Hollywood films, all with military themes, before his career and life were cut short at the age of 25 in the crash of a small airplane he was piloting. Robert_Charles_Francis ( February_26_,_1930 – July_31_,_1955 ) was an_American_actor . He appeared in only_four_Hollywood_films , all with military_themes , before his_career_and_life were_cut short at the_age of 25 in the_crash of a_small_airplane he was_piloting .
